race.name: High-Elf
race.description:
The High-Elves, the oldest of all races, were the first to oppose the oncoming forces of Evil. Known for their great intellect and wisdom, they are the guardians of all that is good.
High-Elves gain bonuses on Intelligence and Wisdom. High-Elves suffer penalties on Constitution and Dexterity.
Natural abilities: Infravision
